name: olwind
description: https://pythonhosted.org/pypng/png.html => create pngs in pyton https://docs.scipy.org/doc/scipy/reference/generated/scipy.interpolate.griddata.html => create grid interpolation from data https://earthscience.stackexchange.com/questions/12057/how-to-interpolate-scattered-data-to-a-regular-grid-in-python
